Row.Text: From the unseen corridors of power, we guide the course of history. Our knowledge predates empires, our influence spans continents, and our secrets endure beyond time itself.
The Illuminati emerge from the shadows, unseen yet unstoppable, shaping destiny through knowledge, wealth, and quiet dominion.

The Illuminati thrive on wealth, influence, and hidden mastery. Leverage increased Gold generation and a unique Culture Tree to unlock powerful traditions, accelerate wonder construction, and outmaneuver rivals from behind the scenes.
The Illuminati were founded in 1776 in Ingolstadt, Bavaria by Adam Weishaupt, a scholar who envisioned a secret order devoted to reason, enlightenment, and the subtle reshaping of society.
Whispers persist that the Knights Templar concealed sacred relics—perhaps even the Ark of the Covenant—after their fall in 1307, entrusting their secrets to hidden successors.

The Eye of Providence, the All-Seeing Eye, symbolizes watchful omniscience and hidden authority. Its origins trace back to ancient civilizations, long before it became a mark of secret orders and unseen guardians.
The Knights Templar rose as warrior monks sworn to protect pilgrims, amassing immense wealth and influence before their abrupt destruction—an end that many believe was only an illusion.
Across the ages, clandestine societies have quietly steered the fate of nations, proving that the greatest power is not wielded openly, but whispered into existence.
